FILE: cm645770v11.0.txt
DYAD: IRAQ - PAKISTAN
RIVALRY: RIV1239
DISPUTE(S): MID1200 
RIVALRY: RIV1240
DISPUTE(S): MID3957 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190308
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190308

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID1200 

TERRMID: MID1200 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID1200 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID1200 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID1200 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID1200 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID1200 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID1200 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID1200 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID1200 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID1200 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID1200 from Gibler 2018 and NYT 2/11/1973, in 1973 Pakistan discovered that Iraq was smuggling weapons into Pakistan via their embassy. The weapons were intended for militarized rebels fighting in Pakistan. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militarized rebels in Pakistan. 

CIVWARLINK: MID1200 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1200 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID1200 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1200 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID1200 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID1200 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3957 

TERRMID: MID3957 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3957 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID3957 from Gibler 2018, this is the Iraqi invasion of Kuwait. Pakistan, as part of a coalition, expelled Iraq from Kuwait. Coded third party link to territorial dispute because the Gulf War was a territorial dispute between Iraq and Kuwait, and Pakistan became involved to expel Iraq from Kuwait. 

MARITMID: MID3957 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3957 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3957 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3957 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3957 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3957 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3957 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield. 

New York Times 2/11/1973. "Pakistan Reports Seizure of Arms."
